subtitleNullable: Updated stock prices of AAl, Apple, Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Netflix,and Tesla
descriptionNullable:
## Context
This captivating dataset delves into the dynamic world of stock prices, chronicling the exhilarating journey of renowned giants such as American Airlines, Apple, Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Netflix, and Tesla. Unveiling the thrilling tale from the beginning of the year until yesterday, this dataset unveils the secrets behind their soaring heights and dramatic fluctuations, offering a compelling glimpse into the pulse of the market.

## Content
Within the dataset, one will encounter the following:

The date - "Date"

The opening price of the stock - "open"

The high price of that day - "high"

The low price of that day - "low"

The closed price of that day - "close"

The amount of stocks traded during that day - "volume"

Different stocks - "ticker"


## Acknowledgements
Through Python programming and checking Sentdex out, I acquired the data from Yahoo Finance. The time period represented starts from 1-1-2023 to 4-6-2023.

## Inspiration
Experience the captivating world of stock trading as volumes fluctuate in both short and long periods. A surge in trading volume signifies heightened market activity and brings exciting price fluctuations. Conversely, decreased volume creates a calmer environment. Explore the intriguing gaps between the adjusted close and the next day's opening price, where market dynamics and overnight news shape trading opportunities. Prepare for an enthralling journey through the mysteries and surprises that lie within the ever-changing market.
title: Stock Prices of 2023

description:

Unveiling the thrilling tale from the beginning of the year until yesterday, this dataset unveils the secrets behind their soaring heights and dramatic fluctuations, offering a compelling glimpse into the pulse of the market.

Within the dataset, one will encounter the following:

The low price of that day - "low"

The closed price of that day - "close"

The amount of stocks traded during that day - "volume"

Different stocks - "ticker"


## Acknowledgements
Through Python programming and checking Sentdex out, I acquired the data from Yahoo Finance. The time period represented starts from 1-1-2023 to 4-6-2023.

## Inspiration

A surge in trading volume signifies heightened market activity and brings exciting price fluctuations. Conversely, decreased volume creates a calmer environment.
